CreateHttpNamespace.name: CreateHttpNamespace
CreateHttpNamespace.description: Grants permission to create an HTTP namespace

CreatePrivateDnsNamespace.name: CreatePrivateDnsNamespace
CreatePrivateDnsNamespace.description: Grants permission to create a private namespace based on DNS, which will be visible only inside a specified Amazon VPC

CreatePublicDnsNamespace.name: CreatePublicDnsNamespace
CreatePublicDnsNamespace.description: Grants permission to create a public namespace based on DNS, which will be visible on the internet

CreateService.name: CreateService
CreateService.description: Grants permission to create a service

DeleteNamespace.name: DeleteNamespace
DeleteNamespace.description: Grants permission to delete a specified namespace

DeleteService.name: DeleteService
DeleteService.description: Grants permission to delete a specified service

DeregisterInstance.name: DeregisterInstance
DeregisterInstance.description: Grants permission to delete the records and the health check, if any, that Amazon Route 53 created for the specified instance

DiscoverInstances.name: DiscoverInstances
DiscoverInstances.description: Grants permission to discover registered instances for a specified namespace and service

DiscoverInstancesRevision.name: DiscoverInstancesRevision
DiscoverInstancesRevision.description: Grants permission to discover the revision of the instances for a specified namespace and service

GetInstance.name: GetInstance
GetInstance.description: Grants permission to get information about a specified instance

GetInstancesHealthStatus.name: GetInstancesHealthStatus
GetInstancesHealthStatus.description: Grants permission to get the current health status (Healthy, Unhealthy, or Unknown) of one or more instances

GetNamespace.name: GetNamespace
GetNamespace.description: Grants permission to get information about a namespace

GetOperation.name: GetOperation
GetOperation.description: Grants permission to get information about a specific operation

GetService.name: GetService
GetService.description: Grants permission to get the settings for a specified service

ListInstances.name: ListInstances
ListInstances.description: Grants permission to get summary information about the instances that were registered with a specified service

ListNamespaces.name: ListNamespaces
ListNamespaces.description: Grants permission to get information about the namespaces

ListOperations.name: ListOperations
ListOperations.description: Grants permission to list operations that match the criteria that you specify

ListServices.name: ListServices
ListServices.description: Grants permission to get settings for all the services that match specified filters

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to lists tags for the specified resource

RegisterInstance.name: RegisterInstance
RegisterInstance.description: Grants permission to register an instance based on the settings in a specified service

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add one or more tags to the specified resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from the specified resource

UpdateHttpNamespace.name: UpdateHttpNamespace
UpdateHttpNamespace.description: Grants permission to update the settings for a HTTP namespace

UpdateInstanceCustomHealthStatus.name: UpdateInstanceCustomHealthStatus
UpdateInstanceCustomHealthStatus.description: Grants permission to update the current health status for an instance that has a custom health check

UpdatePrivateDnsNamespace.name: UpdatePrivateDnsNamespace
UpdatePrivateDnsNamespace.description: Grants permission to update the settings for a private DNS namespace

UpdatePublicDnsNamespace.name: UpdatePublicDnsNamespace
UpdatePublicDnsNamespace.description: Grants permission to update the settings for a public DNS namespace

UpdateService.name: UpdateService
UpdateService.description: Grants permission to update the settings in a specified service
